item.title: Vultr X 3
item.description: 17:40 Friday 07 June 2019 JST Today I spun up three (3) different instances on Vultr.com I spun up 1GB, 2GB, and 4GB RAM instances, with 25GB, 55GB, and 80GB SSD storage, respectively. I am trying them all out with $50 credit good for 30 days, so I am doing the testing in parallel during this $50 credit window.
